job_details.Vacaturetitel: Senior Polyglot Software Engineer - €96.400 5% bonus permanent contract
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Would you like to work at the European Thought Leader of Software Engineering where you work in multidisciplinary teams with data engineers, cloud native developers, and delivery automation experts to solve long term challenging greenfield projects the beat in the heart of some of the most tech driven clients in the Netherlands?
     * Do you have a polyglot mindset, are eager to learn and grow, like to have maximum impact within challenging software projects and be at the forefront of the development in generative AI in functional programming, event sourcing, cloud native, data engineering, scaling and microservices development, SRE, DDD and software craftsmanship?
     * Do you say yes to great benefits such as working from home 4 days per week, 5% end-of-year bonus, 22 energetic knowledge sharing sessions per year, a beautiful office, 6 training days, many home working options and a permanent contract from the start?
     * Do you like to be part of a very ambitious engineering culture where self-development, knowledge sharing and training are top priority and you can grow into lead or architect?

   Then don't wait any longer, this job is made for you!

   More than two decades ago, two entrepreneurs who no longer had to work for money came up with a plan: we are going to let the best engineers boost the most technologically competitive companies, while giving them maximum room to develop and grow themselves. The result is a leading company that has become the Thought Leader within modern software engineering in Europe. Many speak at inspiring conferences, write books or contribute to impactful open source projects.

   This Though Leader is helping impactful, consumer-oriented companies with millions of end-users to harness the power of automation across industries such as eHealth, autonomous driving, FinTech, and e-commerce. They only bite into true transformative challenges in which have a leading role, help their clients from A to Better and can show their authority. Full of architecture/design, complex issues and always working with passionate and very capable team members. People you can be maximum productive. Such a breath of fresh air!

   As a Senior Polyglot Software Engineer Amsterdam, you get the unique opportunity to bite down into one of many complex and long-term software projects close to your house. Always within a squad of your team members, 4 days from home you are the driving factor for clients. From intake, architecture, design, delivery, deployment and knowledge transfer.
job_details.full_text:
Senior Polyglot Software Engineer - €96.400 5% bonus permanent contract

* Would you like to work at the European Thought Leader of Software Engineering where you work in multidisciplinary teams with data engineers, cloud native developers, and delivery automation experts to solve long term challenging greenfield projects the beat in the heart of some of the most tech driven clients in the Netherlands?
     * Do you have a polyglot mindset, are eager to learn and grow, like to have maximum impact within challenging software projects and be at the forefront of the development in generative AI in functional programming, event sourcing, cloud native, data engineering, scaling and microservices development, SRE, DDD and software craftsmanship?
     * Do you say yes to great benefits such as working from home 4 days per week, 5% end-of-year bonus, 22 energetic knowledge sharing sessions per year, a beautiful office, 6 training days, many home working options and a permanent contract from the start?
     * Do you like to be part of a very ambitious engineering culture where self-development, knowledge sharing and training are top priority and you can grow into lead or architect?

   Then don't wait any longer, this job is made for you!

   More than two decades ago, two entrepreneurs who no longer had to work for money came up with a plan: we are going to let the best engineers boost the most technologically competitive companies, while giving them maximum room to develop and grow themselves. The result is a leading company that has become the Thought Leader within modern software engineering in Europe. Many speak at inspiring conferences, write books or contribute to impactful open source projects.

   This Though Leader is helping impactful, consumer-oriented companies with millions of end-users to harness the power of automation across industries such as eHealth, autonomous driving, FinTech, and e-commerce. They only bite into true transformative challenges in which have a leading role, help their clients from A to Better and can show their authority. Full of architecture/design, complex issues and always working with passionate and very capable team members. People you can be maximum productive. Such a breath of fresh air!

   As a Senior Polyglot Software Engineer Amsterdam, you get the unique opportunity to bite down into one of many complex and long-term software projects close to your house. Always within a squad of your team members, 4 days from home you are the driving factor for clients. From intake, architecture, design, delivery, deployment and knowledge transfer.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on general software engineering principles, polyglot programming, and various architectural patterns (event sourcing, DDD, microservices). While it mentions 'generative AI' as an area of development, it lacks specific details about building, fine-tuning, or deploying generative models, RAG systems, or advanced prompt engineering. The core responsibilities described align more with a senior software engineer role that might *incorporate* AI, rather than a specialized GenAI Engineer or ML Engineer role focused on model development and deployment.

job_tasks.justification: The description emphasizes 'software engineering', 'polyglot mindset', 'delivery', 'deployment', 'architecture', 'design', 'scaling', and 'microservices development', all of which are core to traditional software development.
The role involves 'delivery automation experts' and working on 'greenfield projects', indicating a focus on building and delivering software.
The description mentions 'cloud native' development, which is a key aspect of modern software development.
The phrase 'data engineering' is explicitly mentioned as an area of development.
The role involves 'scaling' and 'microservices development', which are fundamental software engineering concerns.
Mention of 'SRE' (Site Reliability Engineering) points to software engineering practices for system reliability and operations.
The mention of 'DDD' (Domain-Driven Design) is a software design and development approach.
The phrase 'software craftsmanship' implies a focus on high-quality software development practices.
The role involves working with 'clients' and understanding their needs for 'greenfield projects' and 'transformative challenges'.
The description mentions working on projects for 'consumer-oriented companies' in various industries, indicating a need to understand business contexts.
The phrase 'generative AI' is mentioned as an area of development, though without specific details on model building or fine-tuning.
The role involves 'architecture, design, delivery, deployment and knowledge transfer', covering the full software development lifecycle.
job_tasks.phrase: architecture, design, delivery, deployment and knowledge transfer

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'delivery automation experts' and 'deployment' suggests involvement in operational aspects of software delivery.
The mention of 'SRE' (Site Reliability Engineering) is directly related to operational aspects of maintaining systems.

soft_skills.phrase: self-development, knowledge sharing and training are top priority
passionate and very capable team members
